ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Short-break from EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail thee! I just cancelled my EQ account. UO changed much eversince my one year absence. Might be getting back in UO...but ah...when s UO2 comin out?
ygData.messageBody:
Hail thee!
I just cancelled my EQ account.
UO changed much eversince my one year absence.
Might be getting back in UO...but ah...when's UO2 comin' out?

Regards,
Wilson

----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>

> Anyway, I'll be going back to UO for a short while, probably after this
> week (at least will get to lvl 40 1st lor, hehe, hey remember u say u will
> help me get staff of wheel once I get lvl 40? hehe). The new UO land
patch
> is coming soon and also a reminder to those UO+EQ player in this list like
> me, better start searching for a spot to place house. I'm may be given up
> all my exisiting houses (including guard zone house, blocked 2S and
blocked
> smithy with own private mining mountain etc) for a castle in the new land.
>
> Wish me good luck in searching a wonder nice place to put up in UO :)
>
> Ziltus (aka Dark Flame, Armageddon Warlord, The Dark Wardens, Baja Shard)
